title: Dragon-san Wants a Friend - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Caring Protagonist   Contracts   Cute Children   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Dragons   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Guardian Relationship   Helpful Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Immortals   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Marriage   Mutated Creatures   Nobles   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated as a Monster   Reincarnated in Another World   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Spirits   Time Skip
author: Michikusa Yamori   道草家守
description:
Desperate to overcome her loner status, a forlorn female student was on her way to a welcome party held for newcomers at her college. Stepping on a banana peel and falling over she passes away. For some reason or another, she is reincarnated into the strongest dragon species…

“…. I really wanted to make friends, but now there is no point!!!”

Despite her complaints, this is the story of a Dragon who rouses herself in order to make friends.>
